# Jail Data Availability 

NH is not on a unified system so data availability varied by county.  


# Data Dictionaries

## Belknap  

```{r}
not_all_na <- function(x) any(!is.na(x))
df <- belknap_adm1 %>% dplyr::select_if(not_all_na)
view_df(df)
```
